title: My account has been hacked
body:
today, connecting to my profile, I noticed that someone else using my account is in a game.
checking the history of the game I found, That someone illegally used my account two days in a row, possibly even longer. Just caught today
How should I act now?
I just changed my password for my account.

replies.body:
That must be scary to see someone on your account, but don't worry we can help!  I've locked your account to prevent further access from the unauthorized party, but I also recommend running through our [account protection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751664-Protecting-Your-Account) to secure your info in and outside of League.  

Reach out to our account team as well by filling our [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) and we can assist with recovery and any necessary reparations.  See you there!
